topic.title: Fecal Occult Blood Test - conformance rules

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] fecalOccultBloodTest with data type Code
Indicates thee results of the diagnostic test FECAL OCCULT BLOOD TEST (FOBT). Possbile values are Not done; Positive (3-card sample); Negative (3-card sample); Positive (6-card sample); Negative (6-card sample); Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfFobt with data type Point In Time
The date of the diagnostic test FECAL OCCULT BLOOD TEST (FOBT).

Contains exactly one [1..1] fecalOccultBloodTest with data type Code
Indicates thee results of the diagnostic test FECAL OCCULT BLOOD TEST (FOBT). Possbile values are Not done; Positive (3-card sample); Negative (3-card sample); Positive (6-card sample); Negative (6-card sample); Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfFobt with data type Point In Time
The date of the diagnostic test FECAL OCCULT BLOOD TEST (FOBT).
